name: Quasar Finance
intro: Application-specific capital management blockchain in the Cosmos ecosystem
introduce: Quasar is an application-specific capital management blockchain in the Cosmos ecosystem that runs self-governed vault-based investment strategies powered by expert and community driven strategies. Quasar is the gateway to multi-chain DeFi investment opportunities offering sustainable, sovereign and ergonomic investment vehicles for investors, while offering powerful tools and infrastructure to create unique vault-based investment strategies for expert users to fundraise on an open marketplace and earn revenue based on their vault management.
